channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-11898] support default partition in metastoredirectsql
item.description: Right now, direct SQL intentionally skips the processing for default partition for PPD case; the SQL query fails and we fall back to JDO. Add support for default partition based on the same rules as JDO (don't return it)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: jpullokkaran ashutoshc sushanth can you take a look?

ATTACHMENT ID: 12761246 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
That is interesting. Looks like ORM doesn't return the default partition in this case. That may be an existing bug or this fix is wrong, instead we should just ignore the thing
Updated the patch to keep behavior consistent with JDO

ATTACHMENT ID: 12761765 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
These tests pass for me. sushanth can you take a look?

+1. (I've looked at the patch, and it makes sense as something that's not wrong, but have not verified the test results that Sergey say pass for him.)

One thing though - in order for this jira to be more readable in the future when we come across this, could you please edit in a description for this issue?
Should this issue be backported to branch-1? It looks like a bug.
